content: On December 22, 1960, soviet scientists attempted to launch Damka ("Little Lady") and Krasavka ("Beauty") on a Korabl Sputnik. However, the upper rocket stage failed and the launch was aborted. The dogs were safely recovered after their unplanned suborbital flight.
translations: ita:Il 22 dicembre 1960, gli scienziati sovietici tentarono di lanciare Damka (Piccola Signora) e Krasavka (Bellezza) su uno
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by Hybrid (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
